actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Bandelier National Monument, New Mexico, as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates approximately 23,085 acres in the Bandelier National Monument, New Mexico, as wilderness. Provides that within such wilderness area the Secretary of the Interior undertake minimum activity necessary to investigate and stabilize sites of archeological interest.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Bandelier National Monument, New Mexico, as wilderness.
